channel.title: error. help please!
channel.description:
the download went just wonderful. i went into video and changed the rez for my game to 1600x1200 and then it just flashed a black window. i heard the music and all that but i had to restart my comp because it wouldent le me do anything. (i used the power button.) so i try to stary it again and i get an error saying...
support.steampowered.com/cgi-bin/steampowered.cfg/php/enduser/std_adp.php?p_faqid=772
i dont know what to do. i already tried going into the "set launch options and typed dxlevel 81 and it didnt do anything. i dont know what to do. help me please. :'(

item.title: error. help please!
item.dc:creator: Knucklenuts
item.description:
it works now. Thank you guys so much.

Read full topic

item.title: error. help please!
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
try adding -w 640 -h 480 to launch options.

Then set your resolution to something lower than 1600x1200

then exit the game and remove that line from the launch options

Read full topic

item.title: error. help please!
item.dc:creator: Karriz
item.description:
What is your video card? Try updating the drivers.

Read full topic
